sourcesContent:
import Survey from './Survey'
import Select from './Select'
import UserForm from './UserForm'
import backBackgroundImage from 'assets/img/back.png'

export const SURVEY_STEPS = [
    {
        questionText: 'How do you feel about your skin?',
        helperText: 'Please select one',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: 1,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Love it!',
            'Pretty good!',
            "It's alright",
            'Could be better',
            'Really hate it!'
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'How do you feel about your health?',
        helperText: 'Please select one',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: 1,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            "I'm the boss!",
            'Pretty good',
            'Balanced',
            'Could be better',
            'Please send help!'
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: "What's your skin type?",
        helperText: 'Please select one',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: 1,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Very dry',
            'Somewhat dry',
            'Combination',
            'Somewhat oily',
            'Very oily'
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'Tell us about your skin.',
        helperText: 'Do any of these bother you? select all that apply',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: Infinity,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Blemishes',
            'Texture',
            'Clogged pores',
            'Fine lines / Wrinkles',
            'Firmness',
            'Pore size',
            'Tone / Evenness',
            'Dryness',
            'Pigmentation / dark spots',
            'Redness / sensitivity',
            'Dullness',
            'Nothing',
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'Do you suffer from any of the following?',
        helperText: 'Please select all that apply',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: Infinity,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Acne',
            'Eczema',
            'Melasma',
            'Rosacea',
            'Nothing',
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'Which products do you use on a regular basis?',
        helperText: 'Please slect all that apply',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: Infinity,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Oil',
            'Toner',
            'Cleanser',
            'Moisturizer',
            'Eye cream',
            'Essence',
            'Serum',
            'Masks',
            'Exfoliator',
            'None',
            'Other'
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'Which factors most influence your skincare purchases?',
        helperText: 'Select up to 3',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: 3,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Price',
            'Value',
            'Ingredients',
            'Vegan / Cruelty-free',
            'Natural / Clean',
            'Efficacy',
            'Advertisements',
            'Recommendations',
            'Sustainability'
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'With which gender do you identify?',
        helperText: 'Please select one',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: Select,
        maxSelect: 1,
        isValid: (state) => state && state.step_values.length > 0,
        options: [
            'Male',
            'Female',
            'Non-binary'
        ]
    },
    {
        questionText: 'Tell us about yourself.',
        backgroundImage: backBackgroundImage,
        component: UserForm,
        clearText: 'Clear answers',
        isValid: (state) => {
            if (!state) { return false }
            const isEmailValid = /^[^,;@ \r\n]+@[^,@; \r\n]+\.[^,@; \r\n]+$/.test(state.email)
            return isEmailValid && state.first_name && state.last_name && state.birthday && state.heard_of_us
        }
    }
]

export default Survey
